summary: An email from an unspecified sender to a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) contractor, requesting that an attached PDF document titled 'Maxwell testifying witness 3500' be saved in relevant folders on an 'Epstein share.' The email is dated June 23, 2021, and pertains to the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Preparation of Witness 3500 Notes
events.description: An attachment titled '2021.06.22aprep_notes.pdf' is referenced, which appears to be preparation notes related to a testifying witness (Witness 3500) in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 23, 2021, concerning the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
It references an attached PDF file named '2021.06.22aprep_notes.pdf' related to 'Maxwell testifying witness 3500'.
The email is directed to a contractor for the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The request is to save the attachment in 'relevant folders on the Epstein share,' indicating organized digital evidence management for the case.
The subject and attachment suggest active trial preparation involving witness testimony around June 2021.
